meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sissy.
meanings.sent1: Her sissinesses were evident when she refused to play rough sports.
meanings.sent2: The sissinesses of the boy made him an easy target for bullies.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sissinesses, he always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: The sissinesses in the room were palpable, like a cloud of pink feathers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the issue of sissinesses in a gentle but firm manner.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a sissy.
meanings.sent1: His sissinesses were evident in the way he avoided confrontation.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her sissinesses, no matter how hard she tried.
meanings.sent3: His sissinesses sometimes led to comical situations at work.
meanings.sent4: The sissinesses of the cat made it the perfect lap companion.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's sissinesses were endearing to everyone around her.
